article.title: AAI to Retrofit Shadow UAS with Common Data Link
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Â AAI Corp., Hunt Valley, Md., was awarded a $35,785,761 firm-fixed-price contract for the modification of an existing contract to retrofit Shadow unmanned aircraft systems Air Vehicles to the Tactical Common Data Link Configuration. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala., is the contracting activity.
